# MedStat: Medical Statistics Tool

## Overview
MedStat is a free, web-based professional medical statistics tool designed for clinical researchers. It performs client-side analysis ensuring complete data privacy.

## Main Features
- Firth Logistic Regression: For small samples/rare events.
- Propensity Score Matching (PSM): For observational studies.
- Survival Analysis: Kaplan-Meier and Cox Regression.
- Privacy: Data never leaves the user's browser (Pyodide/WASM).

## Site Structure
- Main Tool: https://medstat.app/
- User Guide: https://medstat.app/guide/
- Statistical Methods Doc: https://medstat.app/methods/

## Documentation
For detailed statistical methodology (formulas, assumptions), refer to the /methods/ page.
For step-by-step tutorials on using the interface, refer to the /guide/ page.
